metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Not all forms are fillable. Sometimes form creators don’t convert their PDFs to interactive fillable forms. These non-interactive forms are called flat forms.
Specify the PDF/A or PDF/E compliance standard, or none.
To create an interactive form, use the Prepare Forms tool. See Create a form from an existing document .
Generative AI features cannot replace advice provided by a qualified professional and do not form any such relationship (for example, an attorney-client relationship)..

Do not use generative AI features to seek legal, medical, financial, or other kinds of professional advice or any opinions, judgments, or recommendations without conducting your own independent consultation or research.. This is especially true if you try to use these features to generate outputs that are unrelated to your source document

Acrobat and Acrobat Reader support XML data signatures that are used to sign data in XML Forms Architectures (XFA) forms. The form author provides XML signing, validating, or clearing instructions for form events, such as button click, file save, or submit. Like PDF digital signatures, XML digital signatures ensure integrity, authentication, and non-repudiation in documents.

For longer, more complex, or heavily formatted documents, it’s better to create the source document in an application that offers more layout and formatting options, such as Adobe InDesign or Microsoft Word. You can create a blank PDF, rather than beginning with a file, a clipboard image, or scanning. This process can be useful for creating a one-page PDF

Draw in the PDF: • To create a cloud or polygon shape, click to create the start point, move the pointer, and click to create each segment. To draw a line, arrow, or rectangle, either drag across the area where you want the markup to appear, or click twice: once to create the start point and once to create the end point.. To finish drawing the shape, click the start point, or right-click and choos

Manage list items using the list controls (bulleted and numbered) in the left Format panel. You can create lists and, conversely, convert a list item to a paragraph or change list types. Type new text to replace the selected text, or press Delete to remove it

Select the ellipsis from the top right and then select Ask AI Assistant. Select multiple files from third-party applications, and select Share > Adobe Acrobat > Ask AI Assistant. Open Acrobat, then select Try it now from the Try AI Assistant onboarding card in the home view
